careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Be part of a dynamic team that's building innovative software solutions with Ruby on Rails and React. We're looking for talented developers who share our passion for excellence.

benefits.title: Learning & Growth
benefits.description: Continuous learning opportunities with access to conferences, courses, and the latest technologies.

benefits.title: Collaborative Culture
benefits.description: Work in a supportive, collaborative environment where your ideas are valued and encouraged.

benefits.title: Flexible Work
benefits.description: Flexible working hours and remote work options to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

benefits.title: Competitive Benefits
benefits.description: Comprehensive health insurance, retirement plans, and competitive salary packages.

benefits.title: Cutting-Edge Projects
benefits.description: Work on exciting projects with industry leaders like Samsung and Instacart.

benefits.title: Fast-Paced Environment
benefits.description: Be part of a dynamic, fast-paced environment where innovation and creativity thrive.

positions.title: Senior Ruby on Rails Developer
positions.description: We're looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails developer to join our team and work on exciting projects with industry leaders. You'll be responsible for building scalable backend solutions and mentoring junior developers.
requirements: 5+ years of Ruby on Rails development experience
Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL and database optimization
Experience with API development and integration
Familiarity with AWS and cloud deployment

positions.title: React Frontend Developer
positions.description: Join our frontend team to build beautiful, responsive user interfaces using React. You'll work closely with our design team to create exceptional user experiences for our clients.
requirements: Experience with state management (Redux, Context API)

positions.title: Full-Stack Developer
positions.description: Perfect opportunity for developers who enjoy working across the entire stack. You'll build complete applications using Ruby on Rails and React, from database design to user interface implementation.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Ruby on Rails and React
Experience with database design and optimization
Ability to work independently and in teams

process.title: Application Process
process.subtitle: Our streamlined hiring process ensures we find the right fit for both you and our team

steps.title: Apply Online
steps.description: Submit your application with your resume and portfolio through our online form.

steps.title: Initial Review
steps.description: Our team reviews your application and portfolio to assess your fit for the role.

steps.title: Technical Interview
steps.description: Participate in a technical interview to discuss your experience and problem-solving approach.

steps.title: Team Interview
steps.description: Meet with the team to discuss culture fit and answer any questions you may have.
